trans-unit.source: start_label is introduced to handle the issue [4]. The labels indexing starting at 0 will be deprecated in future versions. If mask is not None labels indexing starts at 1 and masked area is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: start_label 引入了start_label来处理问题[4]。索引从0开始的标签将在以后的版本中弃用。如果 mask 不为 None ,则标签索引将从1开始，并且masked区域设置为0。

trans-unit.source: button is a list of integers indicating which mouse buttons should be used for rectangle selection. You can also specify a single integer if only a single button is desired. Default is None, which does not limit which button can be used.
trans-unit.target: button是一个整数列表，指示应使用哪些鼠标按钮进行矩形选择。如果只需要一个按钮，也可以指定一个整数。默认值为None，它不限制可以使用哪个按钮。

trans-unit.source: interactive will draw a set of handles and allow you interact with the widget after it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 交互式将绘制一组手柄，并允许您在绘制后与小部件进行交互。

trans-unit.source: spancoords is one of ‘data’ or ‘pixels’. If ‘data’, minspanx and minspanx will be interpreted in the same coordinates as the x and y axis. If ‘pixels’, they are in pixels.
trans-unit.target: spancoords是“数据”或“像素”之一。如果为“数据”，则将在与x和y轴相同的坐标中解释minspanx和minspanx。如果是“像素”，则以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: state_modifier_keys are keyboard modifiers that affect the behavior of the widget.
trans-unit.target: state_modifier_keys是影响小部件行为的键盘修饰符。

trans-unit.source: ic: an iterable of images (including ImageCollection and MultiImage)

trans-unit.target: kernel_size：整数或类似列表的内容，可选

trans-unit.source: labels: ndarray of type np.uint32, of shape image.shape
markers: int, or ndarray of int, same shape as `image`
mask: ndarray of bools or 0s and 1s, optional
scikit-image proposals, documents describing major changes to the library.
trans-unit.target: 小号词ķ它-我的法师p roposals，描述图书馆重大变化的文件。

trans-unit.source: A 2-D (n+1) row x n column integer array.
trans-unit.target: 一个二维(n+1)行xn列的整数列。

trans-unit.source: A 2-D picture made up of pixels.
trans-unit.target: 由像素组成的二维图像。

trans-unit.source: A 2-D square n x n integer array.
trans-unit.target: 一个二维正方形n x n整数列。

trans-unit.source: A 2-tuple of ints, iaxis_pad_width[0] represents the number of values padded at the beginning of vector where iaxis_pad_width[1] represents the number of values padded at the end of vector.
trans-unit.target: 一个2个ints的tuple,iaxis_pad_width[0]表示在矢量开始时填充的数值,其中iaxis_pad_width[1]表示在矢量结束时填充的数值。

trans-unit.source: A 2d array with each row representing 2 coordinate values for a 2D image, and 3 coordinate values for a 3D image, plus the sigma(s) used. When a single sigma is passed, outputs are: (r, c, sigma) or (p, r, c, sigma) where (r, c) or (p, r, c) are coordinates of the blob and sigma is the standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel which detected the blob. When an anisotropic gaussian is used (sigmas per dimension), the detected sigma is returned for each dimension.
trans-unit.target: 一个2d数组，每行代表2D图像的2个坐标值和3D图像的3个坐标值，以及所用的sigma。当传递单个sigma时，输出为： (r, c, sigma) 或 (p, r, c, sigma) 其中 (r, c) 或 (p, r, c) 是Blob的坐标，而 sigma 是检测到斑点的高斯核的标准偏差。当使用各向异性高斯（每个尺寸的sigma）时，将为每个尺寸返回检测到的sigma。

trans-unit.source: A 2d array with each row representing 3 values for a 2D image, and 4 values for a 3D image: (r, c, sigma) or (p, r, c, sigma) where (r, c) or (p, r, c) are coordinates of the blob and sigma is the standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel which detected the blob.
trans-unit.target: 一个2d数组，每行代表2D图像的3个值和3D图像的4个值： (r, c, sigma) 或 (p, r, c, sigma) 其中 (r, c) 或 (p, r, c) 是斑点的坐标，而 sigma 是检测到斑点的高斯核的标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: A 2d array with each row representing 3 values, (y,x,sigma) where (y,x) are coordinates of the blob and sigma is the standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel of the Hessian Matrix whose determinant detected the blob.
trans-unit.target: 一个二维数组，每行代表3个值 (y,x,sigma) ，其中 (y,x) 是斑点的坐标，而 sigma 是黑森州矩阵的高斯核的标准偏差，其行列式检测到了斑点。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean array with the same shape as image is returned, with True values for areas connected to and equal (or within tolerance of) the seed point. All other values are False.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有与 image 相同形状的布尔数组，连接到种子点并等于种子点（或在种子点的公差范围内）的区域的True值。所有其他值均为False。

trans-unit.source: A Morphological Approach to Curvature-based Evolution of Curves and Surfaces, Pablo Márquez-Neila, Luis Baumela, Luis Álvarez. In IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (PAMI), 2014, DOI:10.1109/TPAMI.2013.106
trans-unit.target: 一种基于曲率的曲线和曲面演化的形态学方法，PabloMárquez-Neila，Luis Baumela，LuisÁlvarez。在IEEE模式分析和机器智能（PAMI）交易中，2014年，DOI：10.1109 / TPAMI.2013.106

trans-unit.source: A Rasterizing Algorithm for Drawing Curves, A. Zingl, 2012 http://members.chello.at/easyfilter/Bresenham.pdf
trans-unit.target: 绘制曲线的栅格化算法，A。Zingl，2012年http://members.chello.at/easyfilter/Bresenham.pdf

trans-unit.source: A Workaround: Convert the Video to an Image Sequence
trans-unit.target: 一个变通方法。将视频转换为图像序列

trans-unit.source: A binary image containing the objects to be skeletonized. ‘1’ represents foreground, and ‘0’ represents background. It also accepts arrays of boolean values where True is foreground.
trans-unit.target: 包含要框架化的对象的二进制图像。“ 1”代表前景，“ 0”代表背景。它还接受布尔值数组，其中True为前景。

trans-unit.source: A binary image containing the objects to be skeletonized. Zeros represent background, nonzero values are foreground.
trans-unit.target: 包含待镂空对象的二进制图像。0代表背景,非零值为前景。

trans-unit.source: A bool image where True represents a boundary pixel. For mode equal to ‘subpixel’, boundaries.shape[i] is equal to 2 * label_img.shape[i] - 1 for all i (a pixel is inserted in between all other pairs of pixels).
trans-unit.target: 布尔图像，其中 True 表示边界像素。对于等于“子像素”的 mode ， boundaries.shape[i] 等于 2 * label_img.shape[i] - 1 对于所有 i 均为1（在所有其他像素对之间插入一个像素）。

trans-unit.source: A boolean mask, True where we want to draw contours. Note that NaN values are always excluded from the considered region (mask is set to False wherever array is NaN).
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔蒙版，True，我们要绘制轮廓。请注意，NaN值始终从考虑的区域中排除（无论 array 为 NaN , mask 都设置为 False ）。

trans-unit.source: A call to show will block execution of code until all windows have been closed.
trans-unit.target: 对 show 的调用将阻止代码执行，直到关闭所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: A call to show will block execution of code until all windows have been closed.
trans-unit.target: 调用 show 将阻止代码执行，直到关闭所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: A class attribute that must be set before use.
trans-unit.target: 使用前必须设置的类属性。

trans-unit.source: A class containing a single multi-frame image.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含单一多帧图像的类。

trans-unit.source: A class for finding the minimum cost path through a given n-d costs array.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于通过给定的n-d成本数组寻找最小成本路径的类。

trans-unit.source: A colection of lines that represent the edges of the graph. It can be passed to the matplotlib.figure.Figure.colorbar() function.
trans-unit.target: 代表图形边缘的线的集合。可以将其传递给 matplotlib.figure.Figure.colorbar() 函数。

trans-unit.source: A contingency table built with skimage.evaluate.contingency_table. If None, it will be computed on the fly.
trans-unit.target: 用skimage.evaluation.contingency_table建立的应急表。如果无,将在飞行中计算。

trans-unit.source: A contingency table built with skimage.evaluate.contingency_table. If None, it will be computed with skimage.evaluate.contingency_table. If given, the entropies will be computed from this table and any images will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 用skimage.evaluate.contingency_table建立的应急表。如果无,将用skimage.evaluation.contingency_table计算。如果给定,将从该表计算熵,任何图像将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A contingency table. cont[i, j] will equal the number of voxels labeled i in im_true and j in im_test.
trans-unit.target: 列联表。 cont[i, j] 将等于体素的数量标记 i 在 im_true 和 j 在 im_test 。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the input array with repeated rows removed.
trans-unit.target: 删除重复行的输入数组的副本。

trans-unit.source: A crash course on NumPy for images

A cython function is called to reduce the image to its skeleton. It processes pixels in the order determined at the previous step, and removes or maintains a pixel according to the lookup table. Because of the ordering, it is possible to process all pixels in only one pass.
trans-unit.target: 调用cython函数将图像还原为骨架。它按照上一步确定的顺序处理像素,并根据查找表删除或保留一个像素。由于顺序的关系,可以只用一次就处理完所有的像素。

trans-unit.source: A fast parallel algorithm for thinning digital patterns, T. Y. Zhang and C. Y. Suen, Communications of the ACM, March 1984, Volume 27, Number 3.
trans-unit.target: A fast parallel algorithm for thinning digital patterns,T.Y.Zhang and C.Y.Suen,Communications of the ACM,March 1984,Volume 27,Number 3.

trans-unit.source: A file in a OpenCv format from which all the cascade classifier’s parameters are loaded.
trans-unit.target: OpenCv格式的文件，所有级联分类器的参数均从该文件中加载。

trans-unit.source: A first class of methods compute a nonlinear function of the intensity, that is independent of the pixel values of a specific image. Such methods are often used for correcting a known non-linearity of sensors, or receptors such as the human eye. A well-known example is Gamma correction, implemented in adjust_gamma().
trans-unit.target: 第一类方法计算强度的非线性函数，该函数与特定图像的像素值无关。此类方法通常用于校正传感器或诸如人眼之类的受体的已知非线性。众所周知的示例是Gamma校正，它是在 adjust_gamma() 。

trans-unit.source: A first class of methods compute a nonlinear function of the intensity, that is independent of the pixel values of a specific image. Such methods are often used for correcting a known non-linearity of sensors, or receptors such as the human eye. A well-known example is Gamma correction, implemented in adjust_gamma().
trans-unit.target: 第一类方法计算强度的非线性函数，该函数与特定图像的像素值无关。这种方法通常用于校正传感器或诸如人眼之类的受体的已知非线性。一个众所周知的示例是Gamma校正，它是在 adjust_gamma() 。

trans-unit.source: A first idea is to take advantage of the local contrast, that is, to use the gradients rather than the grey values.
trans-unit.target: 第一个想法是利用局部的对比度,也就是利用渐变而不是灰色值。

trans-unit.source: A fresh copy has no nodes, edges or graph attributes. It is the same data structure as the current graph. This method is typically used to create an empty version of the graph.
trans-unit.target: 新鲜副本没有节点、边或图属性。它与当前图的数据结构相同。此方法通常用于创建一个空版本的图。

trans-unit.source: A front is grown from each seed point simultaneously, while the origin of the front is tracked as well. When two fronts meet, create_connection() is called. This method must be overloaded to deal with the found edges in a way that is appropriate for the application.
trans-unit.target: 从每一个种子点同时生长出一条战线,同时也会跟踪战线的原点,当两条战线相遇时,调用create_connection()。当两个锋线相遇时,会调用create_connection()。这个方法必须被重载,以适合应用的方式处理发现的边缘。

trans-unit.source: A function that will be called on the threshold at every iteration of the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在算法的每次迭代时,将在阈值上调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to apply to circularly shifted versions of x. Should take x as its first argument. Any additional arguments can be supplied via func_kw.
trans-unit.target: 应用于 x 的循环移位版本的函数。应该以 x 作为第一个参数。可以通过 func_kw 提供任何其他参数。

trans-unit.source: A grey level co-occurrence matrix is a histogram of co-occurring greyscale values at a given offset over an image.
trans-unit.target: 灰度级共现矩阵是图像上给定偏移量下的共现灰度值的直方图。

trans-unit.source: A labeled matrix of the same type and shape as markers
trans-unit.target: 与标记相同类型和形状的标记矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A link to the c array that stores stages information using Stage struct.
trans-unit.target: 连接到使用Stage结构存储阶段信息的c数组。

trans-unit.source: A list of indices into the costs array, starting with one of the start positions passed to find_costs(), and ending with the given end index. These indices specify the minimum-cost path from any given start index to the end index. (The total cost of that path can be read out from the cumulative_costs array returned by find_costs().)
trans-unit.target: costs 数组中的索引列表，从传递给find_costs（）的起始位置之一开始，以给定的 end 索引结束。这些索引指定从任何给定的开始索引到 end 索引的最小成本路径。（该路径的总成本可以从find_costs（）返回的 cumulative_costs 数组中读出。）

trans-unit.source: A list of labels, one per shape in the image. Each label is a (category, ((r0, r1), (c0, c1))) tuple specifying the category and bounding box coordinates of the shape.
trans-unit.target: 一个标签列表,图像中每个形状一个标签。每个标签是一个(类别,((r0,r1),(c0,c1)))元组,指定形状的类别和边界框坐标。

trans-unit.source: A list of n-d ending indices.
A list of n-d starting indices (where n is the dimension of the costs array). The minimum cost path to the closest/cheapest starting point will be found.
trans-unit.target: nd个起始索引的列表（其中n是 costs 数组的维度）。找到最接近/最便宜起点的最小成本路径。

trans-unit.source: A list of offset tuples: each offset specifies a valid move from a given n-d position. If not provided, offsets corresponding to a singly- or fully-connected n-d neighborhood will be constructed with make_offsets(), using the fully_connected parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 偏移元组列表：每个偏移量都指定从给定nd位置开始的有效移动。如果未提供，对应于一个单电荷或全连接第二邻域的偏移量将与make_offsets（）来构建，使用 fully_connected 参数值。

trans-unit.source: A list of submodules and functions is found on the API reference webpage.
trans-unit.target: 在API参考网页上可以找到子模块和功能的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of submodules and functions is found on the API reference webpage.
trans-unit.target: 可以在API参考网页上找到子模块和功能的列表。

trans-unit.source: A local maximum M of height h is a local maximum for which there is at least one path joining M with a higher maximum on which the minimal value is f(M) - h (i.e. the values along the path are not decreasing by more than h with respect to the maximum’s value) and no path for which the minimal value is greater.
trans-unit.target: 高度为h的局部最大值M是局部最大值，对于该局部最大值，至少有一条路径将M与更高的最大值相连接，其最小值为f（M）-h（即，沿路径的值减少的幅度不超过相对于最大值的h），并且没有路径的最大值更大。

trans-unit.source: A local minimum M of depth h is a local minimum for which there is at least one path joining M with a deeper minimum on which the maximal value is f(M) + h (i.e. the values along the path are not increasing by more than h with respect to the minimum’s value) and no path for which the maximal value is smaller.
trans-unit.target: 深度为h的局部最小值M是局部最小值，对于该局部最小值，至少一条路径将M与更深的最小值相连接，该最小值的最大值为f（M）+ h（即，沿路径的值增加的幅度不超过相对于最小值的h），并且没有最大值最大的路径。

trans-unit.source: A lookup table is used, that assigns 0 or 1 to each configuration of the 3x3 binary square, whether the central pixel should be removed or kept. We want a point to be removed if it has more than one neighbor and if removing it does not change the number of connected components.
trans-unit.target: 使用了一个查找表,对3x3二进制正方形的每个配置分配0或1,中心像素是否应该被移除或保留。如果一个点有一个以上的邻点,并且如果删除它不会改变连接的组件数量,我们希望它被删除。

trans-unit.source: A matrix containing the thinned image.
A minimum number of 3 points is required to solve for the parameters.
A multiplication factor applied at calculations for each step, serves to accelerate the algorithm. While higher values may speed up the algorithm, they may also lead to convergence problems.
trans-unit.target: 在每一步的计算中应用乘法因子,以加速算法。虽然较高的数值可能会加快算法的速度,但也可能导致收敛问题。

trans-unit.source: A note on the time dimension

A number used to determine the neighborhood of each evaluated pixel. Adjacent pixels whose squared distance from the center is larger or equal to connectivity are considered neighbors. Ignored if selem is not None.
trans-unit.target: 一个数字，用于确定每个评估像素的邻域。距中心的平方距离大于或等于 connectivity 相邻像素被视为相邻像素。如果 selem 不为None，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: A number used to determine the neighborhood of each evaluated pixel. Adjacent pixels whose squared distance from the center is less than or equal to connectivity are considered neighbors. Ignored if selem is not None.
trans-unit.target: 一个数字，用于确定每个评估像素的邻域。到中心的平方距离小于或等于 connectivity 相邻像素被视为相邻像素。如果 selem 不为None，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: A perspective transform was then applied to the image, prior to rotating it by 90 degrees, cropping and scaling it to obtain the final image.
trans-unit.target: 然后对图像进行透视变换,再将其旋转90度,进行裁剪和缩放,以获得最终图像。

trans-unit.source: A pixel is considered a boundary pixel if any of its neighbors has a different label. connectivity controls which pixels are considered neighbors. A connectivity of 1 (default) means pixels sharing an edge (in 2D) or a face (in 3D) will be considered neighbors. A connectivity of label_img.ndim means pixels sharing a corner will be considered neighbors.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个像素的任何相邻像素具有不同的标签，则该像素被视为边界像素。 connectivity 控制将哪些像素视为相邻像素。连通性为1（默认）表示将共享边缘（在2D模式中）或面部（在3D模式中）的像素视为相邻像素。 label_img.ndim 的连通性意味着共享一个角的像素将被视为相邻像素。

trans-unit.source: A pixel is part of the neighborhood (i.e. labeled 1) if the city block/Manhattan distance between it and the center of the neighborhood is no greater than radius.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个像素与街区中心之间的城市街区/曼哈顿距离不大于半径,则该像素是街区的一部分(即标注为1)。

trans-unit.source: A pixel is within the neighborhood if the Euclidean distance between it and the origin is no greater than radius.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个像素与原点之间的欧氏距离不大于半径,则该像素在邻域内。

trans-unit.source: A pixel is within the neighborhood if the euclidean distance between it and the origin is no greater than radius.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个像素与原点之间的欧氏距离不大于半径,则该像素在邻域内。

trans-unit.source: A plugin connects an image filter (or another function) to an image viewer. Note that a Plugin is initialized without an image viewer and attached in a later step. See example below for details.
trans-unit.target: 插件将图像过滤器（或其他功能）连接到图像查看器。请注意，插件是在没有图像查看器的情况下初始化的，并在以后的步骤中进行了附加。有关详细信息，请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: A plugin consists of two files, the source and the descriptor .ini. Let’s say we’d like to provide a plugin for imshow using matplotlib. We’ll call our plugin mpl:
trans-unit.target: 一个插件包含两个文件，即源文件和描述符 .ini 。假设我们想使用 matplotlib 为 imshow 提供一个插件。我们将其称为 mpl ：

trans-unit.source: A plugin is loaded using the use_plugin command:
trans-unit.target: 使用 use_plugin 命令加载插件：

trans-unit.source: A rank 1 array already padded with zeros. Padded values are vector[:pad_tuple[0]] and vector[-pad_tuple[1]:].
trans-unit.target: 一个等级为1的数组,已经填充了0。填充值是vector[:pad_tuple[0]]和vector[-pad_tuple[1]:]。

trans-unit.source: A simple graphical user interface for visualizing results and exploring parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的图形用户界面,用于可视化结果和探索参数。

trans-unit.source: A single integer is interpreted as the length of one side of a square chunk that should be tiled across the array. One tuple of length array.ndim represents the shape of a chunk, and it is tiled across the array. A list of tuples of length ndim, where each sub-tuple is a sequence of chunk sizes along the corresponding dimension. If None, the array is broken up into chunks based on the number of available cpus. More information about chunks is in the documentation here.
trans-unit.target: 单个整数被解释为应在整个数组上平铺的方形块的一侧的长度。一个长度为 array.ndim 的元组表示块的形状，并将其平铺在整个数组上。长度为 ndim 的元组列表，其中每个子元组是沿着相应维度的块大小序列。如果为None，则根据可用cpus的数量将数组分成多个块。有关块的更多信息，请参见此处的文档。

trans-unit.source: A slice along each dimension of ar_shape, such that the intersection of all the slices give the coordinates of regularly spaced points.
trans-unit.target: 沿着 ar_shape 的每个维度的一个切片，使得所有切片的相交给出规则间隔的点的坐标。

trans-unit.source: A slice to extract the object from the source image.
trans-unit.target: 从源图像中提取对象的切片。

trans-unit.source: A small section of a brick wall.
A special Python image submodule for beginners.
trans-unit.target: 一个针对初学者的特殊Python图像子模块。

trans-unit.source: A statistical test decides whether the corner is defined as the intersection of two edges or a single peak. Depending on the classification result, the subpixel corner location is determined based on the local covariance of the grey-values. If the significance level for either statistical test is not sufficient, the corner cannot be classified, and the output subpixel position is set to NaN.
trans-unit.target: 通过统计测试决定角是定义为两条边的交点还是单峰。根据分类结果,根据灰度值的局部协方差来确定子像素角位置。如果任一统计检验的显著性水平不够,则不能对角进行分类,输出的子像素位置设置为NaN。

trans-unit.source: A structuring element consisting only of ones, i.e. every pixel belongs to the neighborhood.
trans-unit.target: 一个只由1组成的结构元素,即每个像素都属于邻域。

trans-unit.source: A structuring element used to determine the neighborhood of each evaluated pixel (True denotes a connected pixel). It must be a boolean array and have the same number of dimensions as image. If neither selem nor connectivity are given, all adjacent pixels are considered as part of the neighborhood.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定每个评估像素的邻域的结构元素（ True 表示连接的像素）。它必须是一个布尔数组，并且维数与 image 相同。如果既没有给出 selem 也没有给出 connectivity ，则所有相邻像素都将被视为邻域的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A structuring element used to determine the neighborhood of each evaluated pixel. It must contain only 1’s and 0’s, have the same number of dimensions as image. If not given, all adjacent pixels are considered as part of the neighborhood (fully connected).
trans-unit.target: 用于确定每个评估像素的邻域的结构元素。它只能包含1和0，并且具有与 image 相同的尺寸数。如果未给出，则所有相邻像素均视为邻域（完全连接）的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A threshold T is calculated for every pixel in the image using the following formula:
trans-unit.target: 用下面的公式计算出图像中每个像素的阈值T。

trans-unit.source: A user provided callable to which is passed, if the function exists, the current image sample for whatever purpose. The user can store the sample, or compute other moments than the mean. It has no influence on the algorithm execution and is only for inspection.
trans-unit.target: 一个由用户提供的可调用函数,如果函数存在,则将当前图像样本传递给它,无论其用途如何。用户可以存储样本,也可以计算平均值以外的其他时刻。它对算法的执行没有任何影响,只用于检查。

trans-unit.source: A user that requires a specific type of output (e.g., for display purposes), may write:
trans-unit.target: 用户如果需要特定类型的输出(例如,用于显示目的),可以写:

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1. If the area of two blobs overlaps by a fraction greater than threshold, the smaller blob is eliminated.
trans-unit.target: 介于0和1之间的值。如果两个斑点的面积重叠大于 threshold ，则将消除较小的斑点。

trans-unit.source: A version of warnings.warn with a default stacklevel of 2.
trans-unit.target: 默认版本为2 的 warnings.warn 版本。

trans-unit.source: A visualisation of the HOG image. Only provided if visualize is True.

trans-unit.target: 通过使用特定于应用程序的比例因子（ kH ， kC ， kL ， k1 和 k2 ）来。

trans-unit.source: Accuracy parameter. Increasing it, makes the classifier detect less false positives but at the same time the false negative score increases.
trans-unit.target: 准确率参数。增加它,使分类器检测到的假阳性减少,但同时假阴性分数也会增加。

trans-unit.source: Active contour model by evolving a level set. Can be used to segment objects without clearly defined boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 通过演化水平集来建立主动轮廓模型。可用于分割没有明确边界的对象。

trans-unit.source: Active contours by fitting snakes to features of images. Supports single and multichannel 2D images. Snakes can be periodic (for segmentation) or have fixed and/or free ends. The output snake has the same length as the input boundary. As the number of points is constant, make sure that the initial snake has enough points to capture the details of the final contour.
trans-unit.target: 通过将蛇拟合到图像的特征上,实现主动轮廓。支持单通道和多通道2D图像。蛇可以是周期性的(用于分割),也可以是固定和/或自由端。输出的蛇形图与输入边界的长度相同。由于点的数量是恒定的,确保初始蛇有足够的点来捕捉最终轮廓的细节。

trans-unit.source: Active contours without edges implemented with morphological operators. It can be used to segment objects in images and volumes without well defined borders. It is required that the inside of the object looks different on average than the outside (i.e., the inner area of the object should be darker or lighter than the outer area on average).
trans-unit.target: 用形态学运算符实现的无边活动轮廓。它可以用来分割图像和体积中没有明确边界的物体。要求物体的内部平均看起来与外部不同(即物体的内部区域平均应该比外部区域深或浅)。

trans-unit.target: 附加的元数据要和形状信息一起保存在图像_描述标签中,格式为JSON或ImageJ。如果为 "无",则不写第二个image_description标签。

trans-unit.source: Additional tags as [(code, dtype, count, value, writeonce)].

Additionally, some functions take a preserve_range argument where a range conversion is convenient but not necessary. For example, interpolation in transform.warp requires an image of type float, which should have a range in [0, 1]. So, by default, input images will be rescaled to this range. However, in some cases, the image values represent physical measurements, such as temperature or rainfall values, that the user does not want rescaled. With preserve_range=True, the original range of the data will be preserved, even though the output is a float image. Users must then ensure this non-standard image is properly processed by downstream functions, which may expect an image in [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 此外，某些函数采用了一次 preserve_range 参数，在该参数中，范围转换很方便，但不是必需的。例如， transform.warp 中的插值需要一个类型为float的图像，该图像的范围应为[0，1]。因此，默认情况下，输入图像将重新缩放到该范围。但是，在某些情况下，图像值表示用户不希望重新缩放的物理测量值，例如温度或降雨值。使用 preserve_range=True ，即使输出是浮动图像，也将保留数据的原始范围。然后，用户必须确保下游功能可以正确处理此非标准图像，否则可能需要[0，1]中的图像。

trans-unit.source: Adjust an image so that its cumulative histogram matches that of another.
trans-unit.target: 调整图像,使其累积直方图与另一张图像相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Affine transformations for each triangle in the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 对网格中的每个三角形进行仿射变换。

trans-unit.source: Alain Tremeau and Philippe Colantoni “Regions Adjacency Graph Applied To Color Image Segmentation” DOI:10.1109/83.841950
trans-unit.target: Alain Tremeau和Philippe Colantoni“区域邻接图应用于彩色图像分割” DOI：10.1109 / 83.841950

trans-unit.source: Algebraic Reconstruction Techniques are based on formulating the tomography reconstruction problem as a set of linear equations. Along each ray, the projected value is the sum of all the values of the cross section along the ray. A typical feature of SART (and a few other variants of algebraic techniques) is that it samples the cross section at equidistant points along the ray, using linear interpolation between the pixel values of the cross section. The resulting set of linear equations are then solved using a slightly modified Kaczmarz method.
trans-unit.target: 代数重建技术是基于将断层重建问题表述为一组线性方程。沿着每条射线,投影值是沿射线的所有截面值的总和。SART(以及其他一些代数技术的变种)的一个典型特征是,它在沿射线的等距离点上对截面进行采样,使用截面像素值之间的线性插值。然后使用稍加修改的Kaczmarz方法对所得线性方程组进行求解。

trans-unit.target: 算法参数K1（小常数，请参见[1]）。

trans-unit.source: All local maxima of the image. The result image is a binary image, where pixels belonging to local maxima take value 1, the other pixels take value 0.

trans-unit.source: Almost equal to Frangi filter, but uses alternative method of smoothing. Refer to [1] to find the differences between Frangi and Hessian filters.

trans-unit.target: 输出图像的Alpha通道。它可以是标量或可以广播到 image 的数组。如果未指定，则将其设置为对应于 image dtype的最大限制。

trans-unit.source: Alpha values used to blend color with image. 0 is transparent, 1 is opaque.
trans-unit.target: Alpha值用于将颜色与图像混合,0为透明,1为不透明。0为透明,1为不透明。

trans-unit.source: Also known as Contrast Adjustment. This function transforms the input image pixelwise according to the equation O = 1/(1 + exp*(gain*(cutoff - I))) after scaling each pixel to the range 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 也称为对比度调整。在将每个像素缩放到0到1的范围后，此函数根据等式 O = 1/(1 + exp*(gain*(cutoff - I))) 逐像素变换输入图像。

trans-unit.source: Also known as Power Law Transform. This function transforms the input image pixelwise according to the equation O = I**gamma after scaling each pixel to the range 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 也称为幂律变换。此函数根据等式按像素对输入图像进行变换 O = I**gamma 在将每个像素缩放到0到1的范围后， O = I ** gamma像素地。

trans-unit.source: Also known as adaptive or dynamic thresholding. The threshold value is the weighted mean for the local neighborhood of a pixel subtracted by a constant. Alternatively the threshold can be determined dynamically by a given function, using the ‘generic’ method.
trans-unit.target: 也称为自适应或动态阈值。阈值是像素的局部邻域的加权平均值减去常数。或者，可以使用“通用”方法通过给定函数动态确定阈值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can think of reconstruction as a way to isolate the connected regions of an image. For dilation, reconstruction connects regions marked by local maxima in the seed image: neighboring pixels less-than-or-equal-to those seeds are connected to the seeded region. Local maxima with values larger than the seed image will get truncated to the seed value.
trans-unit.target: 另外,你也可以把重构看成是隔离图像连接区域的一种方式。对于扩张,重建连接了种子图像中局部最大值标记的区域:小于或等于这些种子的相邻像素被连接到种子区域。值大于种子图像的局部最大值将被截断为种子值。

trans-unit.source: Although scikit-image does not currently provide functions to work specifically with time-varying 3D data, its compatibility with NumPy arrays allows us to work quite naturally with a 5D array of the shape (t, pln, row, col, ch):
trans-unit.target: 尽管 scikit-image 目前尚不提供专门用于随时间变化的3D数据的功能，但它与NumPy数组的兼容性使我们可以很自然地处理具有以下形状（t，pln，row，col，ch）的5D数组：

trans-unit.source: Although any of the wavelets from PyWavelets can be selected, the thresholding methods assume an orthogonal wavelet transform and may not choose the threshold appropriately for biorthogonal wavelets. Orthogonal wavelets are desirable because white noise in the input remains white noise in the subbands. Biorthogonal wavelets lead to colored noise in the subbands. Additionally, the orthogonal wavelets in PyWavelets are orthonormal so that noise variance in the subbands remains identical to the noise variance of the input. Example orthogonal wavelets are the Daubechies (e.g. ‘db2’) or symmlet (e.g. ‘sym2’) families.
trans-unit.target: 虽然任何从子波的 PyWavelets 可以被选择，阈值方法假定正交小波变换，并且可以适当地不选择所述阈值用于双正交小波。正交小波是可取的，因为输入中的白噪声在子带中仍然是白噪声。双正交小波会导致子带中的彩色噪声。另外，PyWavelets中的正交小波是正交的，因此子带中的噪声方差保持与输入的噪声方差相同。正交小波的示例是Daubechies（例如'db2'）或symmlet（例如'sym2'）族。

trans-unit.source: Although scikit-image does not currently (0.11) provide functions to work specifically with time-varying 3D data, our compatibility with numpy arrays allows us to work quite naturally with a 5D array of the shape (t, pln, row, col, ch):
trans-unit.target: 虽然scikit-image目前(0.11)还没有提供专门处理时变3D数据的功能,但我们对numpy数组的兼容让我们可以很自然地处理形状为(t,pln,row,col,ch)的5D数组。

trans-unit.source: Although the labeling of the axes might seem arbitrary, it can have a significant effect on the speed of operations. This is because modern processors never retrieve just one item from memory, but rather a whole chunk of adjacent items (an operation called prefetching). Therefore, processing of elements that are next to each other in memory is faster than processing them when they are scattered, even if the number of operations is the same:
trans-unit.target: 虽然轴的标注看似随意,但它对操作速度有很大影响。这是因为现代的处理器从来不会只从内存中检索一个项目,而是检索一整块相邻的项目(这种操作称为预取)。因此,处理内存中相邻的元素比处理分散的元素要快,即使操作次数相同。

trans-unit.source: Although the labeling of the axes seems arbitrary, it can have a significant effect on speed of operations. This is because modern processors never retrieve just one item from memory, but rather a whole chunk of adjacent items. (This is called prefetching.) Therefore, processing elements that are next to each other in memory is faster than processing them in a different order, even if the number of operations is the same:
trans-unit.target: 虽然轴的标注看起来很随意,但它对操作速度有很大影响。这是因为现代的处理器从来不会只从内存中检索一个项目,而是检索一整块相邻的项目。(这就是所谓的预取。)因此,处理内存中相邻的元素比处理不同顺序的元素要快,即使操作次数相同。

trans-unit.source: Although we aim to preserve the data range and type of input images, functions may support only a subset of these data-types. In such a case, the input will be converted to the required type (if possible), and a warning message printed to the log if a memory copy is needed. Type requirements should be noted in the docstrings.
trans-unit.target: 虽然我们的目标是保留输入图像的数据范围和类型,但函数可能只支持这些数据类型的一个子集。在这种情况下,输入将被转换为所需的类型(如果可能的话),如果需要内存拷贝,则会在日志中打印一条警告信息。类型要求应该在 docstrings 中注明。

trans-unit.source: Amount of stages in a cascade. Each cascade consists of stumps i.e. trained features.
trans-unit.target: 级联中的阶段数量。每个级联由树桩即训练过的特征组成。

trans-unit.source: An Active Contour Model without Edges, Tony Chan and Luminita Vese, Scale-Space Theories in Computer Vision, 1999, DOI:10.1007/3-540-48236-9_13
trans-unit.target: 一个没有边缘的主动轮廓模型，Tony Chan和Luminita Vese，计算机视觉中的比例空间理论，1999，DOI：10.1007 / 3-540-48236-9_13

trans-unit.source: An algorithm for local contrast enhancement, that uses histograms computed over different tile regions of the image. Local details can therefore be enhanced even in regions that are darker or lighter than most of the image.
trans-unit.target: 局部对比度增强算法,使用在图像的不同瓦片区域计算的直方图。因此,即使在比大部分图像更暗或更亮的区域,局部细节也能得到增强。

trans-unit.source: An array having one more dimension than the images in ic.
trans-unit.target: 一维数组，其维数大于 ic 中的图像。

trans-unit.source: An array having one more dimension than the images in self.
trans-unit.target: 一种数组，其维度比 self 中的图像多。

trans-unit.source: An array in which different regions are labeled with either different integers or boolean values.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组,其中不同的区域用不同的整数或布尔值标记。

trans-unit.source: An array of 0s with the scanned line set to 255. If the linewidth of the line tool is greater than 1, sets the values within the profiled polygon to 128.
trans-unit.target: 一个0的数组,扫描的线条设置为255。如果线条工具的线宽大于1,则将轮廓多边形内的数值设置为128。

trans-unit.source: An array of labels, which must be non-negative integers.
trans-unit.target: 一个标签数组,必须是非负整数。

trans-unit.source: An array representing an ensemble of K images of equal shape.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，表示相等形状的 K 个图像的集合。

trans-unit.source: An array with the same number of dimensions as image whose non-zero elements indicate neighbors for connection. Following the scipy convention, default is a one-connected array of the dimension of the image.
trans-unit.target: 具有与 image 相同尺寸的数组，其非零元素表示连接的邻居。遵循scipy约定，默认值为图像尺寸的单连接数组。

trans-unit.source: An array with the same shape as image is returned, with values in areas connected to and equal (or within tolerance of) the seed point replaced with new_value.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 image 形状相同的数组，并使用 new_value 替换与种子点连接且等于（或在其容许范围内）区域内的值。

trans-unit.source: An example with texture, prominent edges in horizontal and diagonal directions, as well as features of differing scales.
trans-unit.target: 有质感的例子,在水平和对角线方向有突出的边缘,以及不同尺度的特征。

trans-unit.source: An image can also be restored to its original state after modification:
trans-unit.target: 图像修改后也可以恢复到原来的状态。

trans-unit.source: An image in which the boundaries between labels are superimposed on the original image.
trans-unit.target: 在原始图像上叠加标签之间的边界的图像。

trans-unit.source: An image in which the different features will be added.
trans-unit.target: 一个图像,其中将添加不同的功能。

trans-unit.source: An image with the fitted shapes.
An initial segmentation, with each region labeled as a different integer. Every unique value in label_image will correspond to a node in the graph.
trans-unit.target: 初始分割，每个区域标记为不同的整数。 label_image 中的每个唯一值都将对应于图中的一个节点。

trans-unit.source: An inverted image is also called complementary image. For binary images, True values become False and conversely. For grayscale images, pixel values are replaced by the difference of the maximum value of the data type and the actual value. For RGB images, the same operation is done for each channel. This operation can be achieved with skimage.util.invert():
trans-unit.target: 反转图像也称为互补图像。对于二进制图像，“真”值变为“假”，反之亦然。对于灰度图像，像素值将替换为数据类型的最大值与实际值之差。对于RGB图像，对每个通道执行相同的操作。可以使用 skimage.util.invert() 实现此操作：

trans-unit.source: An n-d index into the costs array.
An optional argument to choose the type of denoising performed. It noted that choosing soft thresholding given additive noise finds the best approximation of the original image.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的参数,用于选择执行的去噪类型。它指出,在给定加性噪声的情况下,选择软阈值可以找到原始图像的最佳近似值。

trans-unit.source: An optional mask to limit the application to a certain area. Note that pixels surrounding masked regions are also masked to prevent masked regions from affecting the result.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的掩码,用于将应用限制在某个区域。请注意,被遮罩区域周围的像素也会被遮罩,以防止被遮罩区域影响结果。

trans-unit.source: Andres method presents the advantage that concentric circles create a disc whereas Bresenham can make holes. There is also less distortions when Andres circles are rotated. Bresenham method is also known as midpoint circle algorithm. Anti-aliased circle generator is available with circle_perimeter_aa.
trans-unit.target: 安德列斯（Andres）方法具有同心圆形成圆盘而布雷森汉姆（Bresenham）可以打孔的优点。旋转Andres圆时，变形也更少。Bresenham方法也称为中点圆算法。抗混叠圆发生器可与 circle_perimeter_aa 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Andres method presents the advantage that concentric circles create a disc whereas Bresenham can make holes. There is also less distortions when Andres circles are rotated. Bresenham method is also known as midpoint circle algorithm. Anti-aliased circle generator is available with circle_perimeter_aa.
trans-unit.target: 安德列斯（Andres）方法具有同心圆形成圆盘而布雷森汉姆（Bresenham）可以打孔的优点。旋转Andres圆时，变形也更少。Bresenham方法也称为中点圆算法。抗混叠圆发生器可与 circle_perimeter_aa 一起使用。

trans-unit.target: 第0轴（行）和椭圆的主轴之间的角度与该区域具有相同的第二矩，逆时针的范围为 -pi/2 到 pi/2 。

trans-unit.target: 应用高斯滤波器的拉普拉斯,作为高斯滤波器的近似值。

trans-unit.source: Apply a flat kernel bilateral filter.
Apply a projective transformation (homography) on coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在坐标上应用投影变换(同构)。

trans-unit.source: Apply a simple Difference of Gaussians filter to a color image:
trans-unit.target: 对彩色图像应用一个简单的高斯差滤镜。

trans-unit.source: Apply power law compression to normalize the image before processing. DO NOT use this if the image contains negative values. Also see notes section below.
trans-unit.target: 应用幂定律压缩以在处理之前对图像进行归一化。如果图像包含负值，请勿使用此选项。另请参阅下面的 notes 部分。

trans-unit.source: Apply the Inverse Finite Radon Transform to recover the input
trans-unit.target: 应用反有限镭射变换来恢复输入。

trans-unit.source: Apply the filter in reverse to the given data.
trans-unit.target: 对给定数据反向应用过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Apply the horizontal and vertical Sobel operators to get the gradients within the image. The edge strength is the norm of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 应用水平和垂直Sobel运算符来获得图像内的梯度。边缘强度是梯度的规范。

trans-unit.source: Apply the matching separately for each channel.
trans-unit.target: 对每个通道分别实施匹配。

trans-unit.source: Apply total-variation denoising separately for each channel. This option should be true for color images, otherwise the denoising is also applied in the channels dimension.
trans-unit.target: 对每个通道分别应用总变异去噪。这个选项对于彩色图像应该是正确的,否则也会在通道维度上应用去噪。

trans-unit.source: Apply wavelet denoising separately for each channel (where channels correspond to the final axis of the array).
trans-unit.target: 对每个通道分别应用小波去噪(其中通道对应阵列的最终轴)。

trans-unit.source: Approximate a polygonal chain with the specified tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 近似于指定公差的多边形链。

trans-unit.source: Approximated polygonal chain where M <= N.
Arbitrary graph attribute pairs (key=value) may be assigned
trans-unit.target: 任意的图形属性对(key=value)可以被赋值。

trans-unit.source: Area closing removes all dark structures of an image with a surface smaller than area_threshold. The output image is larger than or equal to the input image for every pixel and all local minima have at least a surface of area_threshold pixels.
trans-unit.target: 区域闭合可以去除图像中所有表面小于面积_阈值的暗部结构。输出图像的每个像素都大于或等于输入图像,并且所有局部最小值的表面至少是面积_阈值像素。

trans-unit.source: Area closings are similar to morphological closings, but they do not use a fixed structuring element, but rather a deformable one, with surface = area_threshold.
trans-unit.target: 区域闭合与形态闭合类似,但它们不使用固定的结构元素,而是使用可变形的结构元素,surface=area_threshold。

trans-unit.source: Area opening removes all bright structures of an image with a surface smaller than area_threshold. The output image is thus the largest image smaller than the input for which all local maxima have at least a surface of area_threshold pixels.
trans-unit.target: 区域开放删除图像中所有表面小于 area_threshold 的明亮结构。因此,输出图像是比输入图像小的最大图像,其中所有局部最大值至少有一个面积_阈值像素的表面。

trans-unit.source: Area openings are similar to morphological openings, but they do not use a fixed structuring element, but rather a deformable one, with surface = area_threshold. Consequently, the area_opening with area_threshold=1 is the identity.
trans-unit.target: 面积开孔与形态开孔类似,但它不使用固定的结构元素,而是使用可变形的结构元素,表面=面积_阈值。因此,面积_阈值=1的面积开孔是身份。

trans-unit.source: Areas of the image with a value smaller than this threshold will be considered borders. The evolution of the contour will stop in this areas.
trans-unit.target: 小于此阈值的图像区域将被视为边界。轮廓的演变将在这些区域停止。

trans-unit.source: Arganda-Carreras I, Turaga SC, Berger DR, et al. (2015) Crowdsourcing the creation of image segmentation algorithms for connectomics. Front. Neuroanat. 9:142. DOI:10.3389/fnana.2015.00142
trans-unit.target: Arganda-Carreras I，Turaga SC，Berger DR等。（2015）众包连接医学的图像分割算法的创建。正面。神经anat。9：142。DOI：10.3389 / fnana.2015.00142

trans-unit.source: Array containing (x, y, z) coordinates for V unique mesh vertices.
trans-unit.target: 包含 V 个独特网格顶点的 (x,y,z)坐标的阵列。

trans-unit.source: Array containing down-sampling integer factor along each axis.
trans-unit.target: 包含沿各轴向下取样整数因子的阵列。

trans-unit.source: Array containing the threshold values for the desired classes.
trans-unit.target: 包含所需类的阈值的阵列。

trans-unit.source: Array coordinates/values are assumed to refer to the center of the array element. Take a simple example input: [0, 1]. The interpolated position of 0.5 in this array is midway between the 0-element (at x=0) and the 1-element (at x=1), and thus would fall at x=0.5.
trans-unit.target: 假定数组坐标/值指向数组元素的中心。举一个简单的示例输入： [0, 1] 。该数组中0.5的插值位置位于0元素（在 x=0 处）和1元素（在 x=1 处）之间的中间位置，因此将落在 x=0.5 处。

trans-unit.source: Array elements with infinite or negative costs will simply be ignored, as will paths whose cumulative cost overflows to infinite.
trans-unit.target: 成本为无限或负数的数组元素将被忽略,累积成本溢出为无限的路径也将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Array in which True indicates the locations where image was above the hysteresis threshold.
trans-unit.target: “ True 数组表示 image 高于滞后阈值的位置。

trans-unit.source: Array of N points that describe an image of D dimensionality in Cartesian space.
trans-unit.target: 在笛卡尔空间中描述D维图像的N个点的阵列。

trans-unit.source: Array of N points that describe an image of D dimensionality in Cartesian space. A tuple of coordinates as returned by np.nonzero is also accepted as input.
trans-unit.target: N个点的数组，描述笛卡尔空间中的D维图像。由 np.nonzero 返回的坐标元组也被接受作为输入。
